code: import{useRef}from'react';import{ChevronLeft,ChevronRight}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const benefits=[{title:"WIZZ Bundle",description:"Save even more with our flight bundles.",image:"/images/bundle.jpg"},{title:"WIZZ Priority",description:"Bring an extra trolley bag onboard and enjoy the benefits of priority boarding and check-in.",image:"/images/priority.jpg"},{title:"WIZZ Discount Club",description:"Join the Club to save on booking and baggage.
